Uses of Class
org.simalliance.openmobileapi.Channel

Packages that use Channel
org.simalliance.openmobileapi SIMalliance Open Mobile API interface that provides access to secure elements available in the device. 
 

Uses of Channel in org.simalliance.openmobileapi
 

Methods in org.simalliance.openmobileapi that return Channel
 Channel Session.openBasicChannel(byte[] aid)
          Get an access to the basic channel, as defined in the ISO7816-4 specification (the one that has number 0).
 Channel Session.openLogicalChannel(byte[] aid)
          Open a logical channel with the secure element, selecting the application represented by the given AID.
